subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: University of Connecticut officials said they had no plans to cut ties with Robert G. Burton, a donor who demanded the return of $3 million because he felt he was not adequately consulted in the hiring of their new football coach, Paul Pasqualoni.
snippet: University of Connecticut officials said they had no plans to cut ties with Robert G. Burton, a donor who demanded the return of $3 million because he felt he was not adequately consulted in the hiring of their new football coach, Paul Pasqualoni.
